content.p: Looking after your mental health is just as important as your physical health. Our professional counsellors provide free and confidential psychological support for all of our students. We offer professional support for any personal, emotional or mental health problems you might experience during your academic life. As well as individual and group counselling sessions, our counselling service runs a variety of group workshops and provides useful self-help resources. Book a consultation Group sessions If you think you would benefit from our counselling service, you can self refer. We offer appointments at: If you want to book a counselling consultation, visit the University Counselling Service webpage.
